00034 void EuclideanClustering::extractClusters(brics_3d::PointCloud3D *inCloud){
00035 
00036 
00037         int k = inCloud->getSize();
00038         brics_3d::NearestNeighborANN nearestneighborSearch;
00039         brics_3d::Point3D querryPoint3D;
00040         vector<int> neighborIndices;
00041 
00042         nearestneighborSearch.setData(inCloud);
00043         nearestneighborSearch.setMaxDistance(this->clusterTolerance);
00044         //      nearestneighborSearch.setMaxDistance(1000);
00045         // Create a bool vector of processed point indices, and initialize it to false
00046         std::vector<bool> processed (inCloud->getSize(), false);
00047 
00048 
00049         // Process all points in the indices vector
00050         for (size_t i = 0; i < inCloud->getSize(); ++i)
00051         {
00052                 if (processed[i])
00053                         continue;
00054 
00055                 std::vector<int> seed_queue;
00056                 int sq_idx = 0;
00057                 seed_queue.push_back (i);
00058                 //std::cout << "[CHEAT][EuclideanClustering3D] "<< i << " : " << seed_queue.size () << std::endl;
00059                 processed[i] = true;
00060 
00061                 while (sq_idx < (int)seed_queue.size ())
00062                 {
00063 
00064                         // Search for sq_idx
00065                         neighborIndices.clear();
00066                         querryPoint3D = (*inCloud->getPointCloud())[sq_idx];
00067                         nearestneighborSearch.findNearestNeighbors(&querryPoint3D, &neighborIndices, k);
00068 
00069                         //if (!tree->radiusSearch (seed_queue[sq_idx], tolerance, nn_indices, nn_distances))
00070                         if(neighborIndices.size()==0)
00071                         {
00072                                 sq_idx++;
00073                                 continue;
00074                         }
00075 
00076                         for (size_t j = 0; j < neighborIndices.size(); ++j)             // nn_indices[0] should be sq_idx
00077                         {
00078                                 if (processed[neighborIndices[j]])                             // Has this point been processed before ?
00079                                         continue;
00080 
00081                                 // Perform a simple Euclidean clustering
00082                                 seed_queue.push_back (neighborIndices[j]);
00083                                 processed[neighborIndices[j]] = true;
00084                         }
00085 
00086                         sq_idx++;
00087                 }
00088 //              std::cout << "[CHEAT][EuclideanClustering3D] {sq_id : seed_q.size}"<< sq_idx << " : "<< seed_queue.size() << std::endl;
00089                 // If this queue is satisfactory, add to the clusters
00090                 if (seed_queue.size () >= minClusterSize && seed_queue.size () <= maxClusterSize)
00091                 {
00092 //                      std::cout << "[CHEAT][EuclideanClustering3D] found one cluster, size="<< seed_queue.size() << std::endl;
00093 
00094                         seed_queue.erase(std::unique(seed_queue.begin(), seed_queue.end()),seed_queue.end());
00095                         brics_3d::PointCloud3D *tempPointCloud =  new brics_3d::PointCloud3D();
00096 
00097                         for (size_t j = 0; j < seed_queue.size (); ++j) {
00098 
00099                                 tempPointCloud->addPointPtr((*inCloud->getPointCloud())[seed_queue[j]].clone());
00100 
00101                         }
00102                         extractedClusters.push_back(tempPointCloud);
00103 //                      delete tempPointCloud; //?
00104                 }
00105 //              std::cout << "[CHEAT][EuclideanClustering3D] "<< i << " : " << seed_queue.size () << std::endl;
00106         }
00107 }
00108 
00109 
00110 
00111 int EuclideanClustering::segment(){
00112 
00113         assert (this->inputPointCloud != 0);
00114         extractClusters(this->inputPointCloud);
00115         return 1;
00116 }
